text: The Forgiveness of Blood () is a 2011 Albanian American Italian Danish British drama movie directed by Joshua Marston and starring Refet Abazi, Veton Osmani, Tristan Halilaj, Erjon Mani. ==Other websites== * Category:2011 drama movies Category:Albanian movies Category:American drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Joshua Marston Category:Movies set in Albania
title: The Forgiveness of Blood
